ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the Member Plan is valid for the Patient.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(MemberPlan__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Patient__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(MemberPlan__r.Member__c)), MemberPlan__r.Member__c != Patient__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid Member Plan reference: The Member Plan must be associated with the Patient.
